metadata.title: Add ZeptoClaw - Ultra-Lightweight Rust AI Assistant
metadata.description: Adds ZeptoClaw — a ~6MB single Rust binary AI assistant with ~50ms startup and ~6MB RAM usage. Features 29 integrated tools, 9 LLM providers, 9 communication channels, 2,900+ tests, multi-tenant architecture, and Prometheus metrics. Official GHCR image available.
metadata.author: Antigravity

operations.description: Add ZeptoClaw as a single container using the official GHCR image

template.title: ZeptoClaw
template.name: zeptoclaw
template.description: Ultra-lightweight Rust AI assistant — ~6MB binary, ~50ms startup, ~6MB RAM. Features 29 integrated tools, 9 LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Groq, Mistral, etc.), 9 communication channels (Telegram, Slack, Discord, email, webhooks), 2,900+ tests, and multi-tenant architecture. Supports Docker, Landlock, Firejail, and Bubblewrap sandboxing. Prometheus metrics on /metrics. Non-root container.

env.name: RUST_LOG
env.label: Log Level
env.description: Rust logging verbosity for the ZeptoClaw service.

env.name: ZEPTOCLAW_PROVIDERS_OPENAI_API_KEY
env.label: OpenAI API Key
env.description: API key for the OpenAI provider (optional — can also configure via /data/config.json).

env.name: ZEPTOCLAW_PROVIDERS_ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
env.label: Anthropic API Key
env.description: API key for the Anthropic/Claude provider (optional — can also configure via /data/config.json).

env.name: ZEPTOCLAW_PROVIDERS_GROQ_API_KEY
env.label: Groq API Key
env.description: API key for the Groq provider (optional — can also configure via /data/config.json).

template.note:
ZeptoClaw uruchamia się domyślnie w trybie gateway: port 8080 obsługuje integracje messaging (Telegram, Slack, Discord, webhooks), port 9090 to endpoint health check (/healthz) i metryki Prometheus (/metrics).

Konfiguracja dostawców LLM i kanałów komunikacji w pliku /data/config.json — hot-reload co 30 sekund bez restartu kontenera.

Multi-tenant: uruchom osobny kontener dla każdego użytkownika / tenant z oddzielnym wolumenem /data. Przykład w docker-compose.multi-tenant.yml. Każda instancja zużywa ~6MB RAM i 0.05 CPU w spoczynku.

Auto-aktualizacja: docker exec zeptoclaw zeptoclaw update

Dokumentacja: github.com/qhkm/zeptoclaw
